page.title: 16CLUBS
page.content: People from Bulkington and Keevil support several clubs which cater for all ages and differing interests. Keevil Village Hall is the base for a Mother and Toddler Group, children's Gym Club, Youth Club, WI,and for meet- ings of the Young Families, Mothers Union and Silver Threads - a group for older people; they raise funds for their own activities, which include outings to Age Concern events and to local and distant towns. Slim and Trim is a well attended weekly exercise-for -fitness session led by a Slimnastics trained instructor, who also advises on diet and health matters.There is an active league Cricket team. Bingo is held in Bulkington Hall fortnightly. A branch of the national Federation of Children's Book Groups meets in the homes of parents to promote interest in many aspects of children's books.
